levels.description: Attacks all blocked enemies once, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds. ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</> and first Talent's effect increases to <@ba.vup>{talent_scale}</> times
